title: Punt Blocks Are the Best Play in the NFL?
itunes:title: Punt Blocks Are the Best Play in the NFL?
description:
The Good Morning Football Crew share the biggest takeaways from week 3 of the NFL season and looks ahead to week 4 by answering who's the better 3-0 team the Chiefs or the Rams? The gang also discusses what we learned from week 3. Lastly, Kay Adams, Nate Burleson, Peter Schrager, and Kyle Brandt give you their underappreciated storylines. Be sure to check in every Wednesday to the GMFB podcast! Like, share, subscribe!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
